page.title: 04Local Industry
page.content: The Abbatoir at Roston Common has been part of the scene for many years.The services provided are used by farmers from an area ranging Matlock, Melton Mowbray,Banbury. The main use of the slaughterhouse is the humane killing of casualty cows and stock animals. Casualty cows are animals that have had an accident and cannot be helped in any other way. The working hours are not 9 to 5, many days in the week start in the early morning till late at night depending on the needs of the animals in trouble.
